definition: animal hide/leather/to reform/to remove/to expel (from office)
fellmonger/a dealer who works with animal hides and skins

sentences.english: Combination oiled nubuck leather upper with textile fabric accents.
sentences.chinese: 結合上油紡織面料口音磨砂皮革鞋面。
豐富的馬籠頭皮革飾邊。

sentences.english: It now features Onyx Nubuck leather highlighted in orange.
sentences.chinese: 現在它的功能瑪瑙磨砂皮革中強調橙色。

sentences.english: Plush leather, matte-finish tactile buttons: quality craftsmanship.
sentences.chinese: 舒適豪華的皮革，磨砂觸覺按鈕:高品質工藝。

sentences.english: Some blacksmithing recipes require leather, which you will need to buy from a skinner.
sentences.chinese: 某些鍛造配方還需要皮革，你可以從剝皮者那裏購買。

sentences.english: Cork and leather footbed for added comfort.
sentences.chinese: 軟木和皮革鞋底，增加舒適度。

sentences.english: Made of printed synthetic fabric with synthetic leather trim.
sentences.chinese: 印有合成皮革飾邊的化纖面料製成的。

sentences.english: In comparison to other leathers, deerskin offers comparatively high tensile strength.
sentences.chinese: 與其它皮革相比，鹿革有更高的拉伸強度。

sentences.english: PU-coated leather provides durability and easy care.
sentences.chinese: 聚氨酯塗層皮革提供耐用性。

sentences.english: Leather and Allied Product Manufacturing Subsector in the U. S.
sentences.chinese: 美國皮革及其副產品製造行業報告。

sentences.english: China's leather industry to expand the number of main roads is no longer much prospect.
sentences.chinese: 中國皮革業以數量擴張爲主的道路已無多大前景。

sentences.english: He smelled of horses and dogs and blood and leather.
sentences.chinese: 他一身馬和狗的味道，還有血和皮革味。

sentences.english: These are leather goods of high quality.
sentences.chinese: 這些是高質量的皮革製品。

sentences.english: A light tube hangs below the shelves on four leather straps.
sentences.chinese: 燈管用四條皮革帶掛在架子的下方。

definition: dermis (layer within the skin containing sense of touch)
texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
